title: Heart Arrow
summaries: The Heart Arrow is a type of arrow that always inflicts the Stunned debuff on enemies hit, stunning them for 1.5 seconds. They can be purchased from the Merchant for 50 CC each during the Valentine's Day seasonal event on the Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version.

statistics.Tooltip: Legendary arrows from cupid himself, stuns enemies on hit
statistics.Buy: 50 CC
statistics.Sell: 10 CC
